resources.string: Live More with Bengal News Channel and E-Paper

This app makes use of the YouTube Web view and Exoplayer to live stream the news channels inside the app. Neither we have control over the published content nor we are responsible for the content published on these channels. Below we have listed the official website of the news channels being streamed inside our app. Please get in touch with the original publisher in case of any clarification required on the contents of the channel.

We make it easy to read the most popular bengali daily newspapers inside our app. We load the daily newspapers from their official website inside our app browser to make it easy to read newspapers without leaving the app. We don\'t have any control over the contents being published on the listed newspapers. For any queries regarding the published content, please get in touch with the original publisher. We have listed the websites of ePaper publishers below
